Literature.Title: Novel antimicrobial peptides from the venom of the eusocial bee Halictus sexcinctus (Hymenoptera: Halictidae) and their analogs.
Literature.Author: Monincová L, Budesínský M, Slaninová J, Hovorka O, Cvacka J, Voburka Z, Fucík V, Borovicková L, Bednárová L, Straka J, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=22.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli B(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>100µM)
